description: The Mountain Sled Crewneck is a sustainable blend perfect for everyday wear. Made of 60 % recycled polyester and 40 % organic cotton, it's soft yet durable. Featuring unique artwork by Dan Sheridan, it showcases nature's beauty. The rib-knit binding collar, cuffs, and hem provide additional comfort. GRS, GOTS, and Oeko-Tex® certified. Elevate your wardrobe with this eco-friendly statement piece.
name: Hooke Mountain Sled Crewneck - Mens
